author: Anonymous Atom
title: raining eggs template
question:
(@template MouseEvent)

(define (lay-egg loe x y me)
  (cond [(mouse=? me "button-down") (cons (make-egg x y 0) loe)]
        [else loe]))
Above is the solution for raining eggs. I was wondering why Egg is not included in the template when the first cond case uses components of Egg?
student_answer:
KeyEvent and MouseEvent take priority in the template. An @template tag can only have
1
datatype and the more important one is KeyEvent/MouseEvent.
